articles.title: Solar panels - an eco-disaster waiting to happen? - BBC
articles.description: A French factory is pioneering recycling of solar units as experts warn of a waste mountain by 2050.
articles.content:
While they are being promoted around the world as a crucial weapon in reducing carbon emissions, solar panels only have a lifespan of up to 25 years. 
Experts say billions of panels will eventually … [+6391 chars]
